Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by the AACR Pediatric Cancer Working Group. The 2022 PCWG Town Hall will feature three presentations on the most current and controversial topics in the pediatric community, followed by a 15-minute panel discussion. The theme of the session is Pediatric Cancer Drug Discovery and will includeÂ presentations on menin inhibitors, Ras/MAPK pathway inhibitors and novel CAR T Cell Therapies. The Town Hall will also include a networking component at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
Location: Grand Ballroom D, Hilton New Orleans Riverside
